position.marginalia_text: M. Antonius Columna, pra[e]clarissimus Iuuenis, post paterna[m] Etrusco bello mortem; Prospero Patruo, et Fabritio huius patrueli, celeberrimis Ducibus adha[e]sit: ab hisq[ue] certissimis militia[e] pra[e]ceptis imbutus,

marginalia.translation: Marcantonio Colonna, a most distinguished young man, after the death of his father in the Etruscan war, kept close to his paternal uncle Prosperus, and his cousin Fabrizio, most celebrated dukes: and having learned from these men the most certain principles of war,

underline.text: where largelye of the same gentilman
matters of warre, both wittyly and prudently
onely to the life of Souldiours, but
ciuill mens liues, whiche grauely of a moste wise

mark.name: plus_sign
mark.text: matters of warre, both wittyly and prudently

mark.name: hash
mark.text: ciuill mens liues, whiche grauely of a moste wise
